Type%20Definitions.html#/c:RCPurchases.h.name: RCReceivePurchaserInfoBlock
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:RCPurchases.h.abstract: Completion block for calls that send back a PurchaserInfo

Protocols/RCPurchasesDelegate.html#/c:ob.name: -purchases:didReceiveUpdatedPurchaserInfo:
Protocols/RCPurchasesDelegate.html#/c:ob.abstract: Called whenever RCPurchases receives updated purchaser info. This may happen periodically

Protocols/RCPurchasesDelegate.html#/c:ob.name: -purchases:shouldPurchasePromoProduct:defermentBlock:
Protocols/RCPurchasesDelegate.html#/c:ob.abstract: Called when a user initiates a promotional in-app purchase from the App Store. If your app is able to handle a purchase at the current time, run the deferment block in this method. If the app is not in a state to make a purchase: cache the defermentBlock, then call the defermentBlock when the app is ready to make the promotional purchase. If the purchase should never be made, you don’t need to ever call the defermentBlock and RCPurchases will not proceed with promotional purchases.

Protocols/RCPurchasesDelegate.html.name: RCPurchasesDelegate
Protocols/RCPurchasesDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate for RCPurchases responsible for handling updating your app’s state in response to updated purchaser info or promotional product purchases.

Enums/RCPurchaseOwnershipType.html#/c:@E.abstract: The purchase was made directly by this user.

Enums/RCIntroEligibilityStatus.html#/c:@.abstract: The user is eligible for a free trial or intro pricing for this product.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: debugLogsEnabled
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Enable debug logging. Useful for debugging issues with the lovely team @RevenueCat

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Set a custom log handler for redirecting logs to your own logging system.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Used to set the log level. Useful for debugging issues with the lovely team @RevenueCat

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: proxyURL
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Set this property to your proxy URL before configuring Purchases only if you’ve received a proxy key value from your RevenueCat contact.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: forceUniversalAppStore
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Set this property to true only if you’re transitioning an existing Mac app from the Legacy Mac App Store

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: simulatesAskToBuyInSandbox
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Set this property to true only when testing the ask-to-buy / SCA purchases flow. More information:

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +configureWithAPIKey:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Configures an instance of the Purchases SDK with a specified API key. The instance will be set as a singleton. You should access the singleton instance using [RCPurchases sharedPurchases]

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +configureWithAPIKey:appUserID:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Configures an instance of the Purchases SDK with a specified API key and app user ID. The instance will be set as a singleton. You should access the singleton instance using [RCPurchases sharedPurchases]

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +configureWithAPIKey:appUserID:observerMode:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Configures an instance of the Purchases SDK with a custom userDefaults. Use this constructor if you want to sync status across a shared container, such as between a host app and an extension. The instance of the Purchases SDK will be set as a singleton. You should access the singleton instance using [RCPurchases sharedPurchases]

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +configureWithAPIKey:appUserID:observerMode:userDefaults:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Configures an instance of the Purchases SDK with a custom userDefaults. Use this constructor if you want to sync status across a shared container, such as between a host app and an extension. The instance of the Purchases SDK will be set as a singleton. You should access the singleton instance using [RCPurchases sharedPurchases]

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +configureWithAPIKey:appUserID:observerMode:userDefaults:dangerousSettings:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Configures an instance of the Purchases SDK with a custom userDefaults. Use this constructor if you want to sync status across a shared container, such as between a host app and an extension. The instance of the Purchases SDK will be set as a singleton. You should access the singleton instance using [RCPurchases sharedPurchases]

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +canMakePayments
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Indicates whether the user is allowed to make payments.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: isConfigured
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: <div class="aside aside-note">

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: allowSharingAppStoreAccount
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Set this to true if you are passing in an appUserID but it is anonymous, this is true by default if you didn’t pass an appUserID

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: finishTransactions
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Default to YES, set this to NO if you are finishing transactions with your own StoreKit queue listener

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +frameworkVersion
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: This version of the Purchases framework

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: delegate
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Delegate for RCPurchases instance. The delegate is responsible for handling promotional product purchases and changes to purchaser information.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: appUserID
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: The appUserID used by RCPurchases. If not passed on initialization this will be generated and cached by RCPurchases.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: isAnonymous
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: If the appUserID has been generated by RevenueCat

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -createAlias:completionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: This function will alias two appUserIDs together.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -identify:completionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: This function will identify the current user with an appUserID. Typically this would be used after a logout to identify a new user without calling configure.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -resetWithCompletionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Resets the Purchases client clearing the saved appUserID. This will generate a random user id and save it in the cache.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -logIn:completionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: This function will logIn the current user with an appUserID.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -logOutWithCompletionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Logs out the Purchases client clearing the saved appUserID. This will generate a random user id and save it in the cache.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +addAttributionData:fromNetwork:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Send your attribution data to RevenueCat so you can track the revenue generated by your different campaigns.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: +addAttributionData:fromNetwork:forNetworkUserId:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Send your attribution data to RevenueCat so you can track the revenue generated by your different campaigns.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -purchaserInfoWithCompletionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Get latest available purchaser info.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -offeringsWithCompletionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Fetch the configured offerings for this users. Offerings allows you to configure your in-app products via RevenueCat and greatly simplifies management. See the guide (https://docs.revenuecat.com/entitlements) for more info.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -productsWithIdentifiers:completionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Fetches the SKProducts for your IAPs for given productIdentifiers. Use this method if you aren’t using -offeringsWithCompletionBlock:.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -purchaseProduct:withCompletionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Use this function if you are not using the Offerings system to purchase an SKProduct. If you are using the Offerings system, use -[RCPurchases purchasePackage:withCompletionBlock] instead.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -purchasePackage:withCompletionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Purchase the passed RCPackage.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -restoreTransactionsWithCompletionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: This method will post all purchases associated with the current App Store account to RevenueCat and become associated with the current appUserID.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -syncPurchasesWithCompletionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: This method will post all purchases associated with the current App Store account to RevenueCat and become associated with the current appUserID.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -checkTrialOrIntroductoryPriceEligibility:completionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Computes whether or not a user is eligible for the introductory pricing period of a given product. You should use this method to determine whether or not you show the user the normal product price or the introductory price. This also applies to trials (trials are considered a type of introductory pricing).

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -paymentDiscountForProductDiscount:product:completion:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Use this function to retrieve the SKPaymentDiscount for a given SKProduct.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -purchaseProduct:withDiscount:completionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Use this function if you are not using the Offerings system to purchase an SKProduct with an applied SKPaymentDiscount. If you are using the Offerings system, use -[RCPurchases purchasePackage:withDiscount:withCompletionBlock] instead.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -purchasePackage:withDiscount:completionBlock:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Purchase the passed RCPackage.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -invalidatePurchaserInfoCache
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Invalidates the cache for purchaser information.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -presentCodeRedemptionSheet
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Displays a sheet that enables users to redeem subscription offer codes that you generated in App Store Connect.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setAttributes:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attributes are useful for storing additional, structured information on a user.

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setEmail:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the email address for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the phone number for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the display name for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setPushToken:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the push token for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setAdjustID:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the Adjust Id for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setAppsflyerID:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the Appsflyer Id for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setFBAnonymousID:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the Facebook SDK Anonymous Id for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setMparticleID:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the mParticle Id for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setOnesignalID:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the OneSignal Player ID for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setAirshipChannelID:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the Airship Channel ID for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setMediaSource:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the install media source for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setCampaign:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the install campaign for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setAdGroup:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the install ad group for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setAd:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the install ad for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setKeyword:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the install keyword for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -setCreative:
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Subscriber attribute associated with the install ad creative for the user

Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.name: -collectDeviceIdentifiers
Classes/RCPurchases.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPu.abstract: Automatically collect subscriber attributes associated with the device identifiers

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: activeSubscriptions
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: All subscription product identifiers with expiration dates in the future.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: allPurchasedProductIdentifiers
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: All product identifiers purchases by the user regardless of expiration.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: latestExpirationDate
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Returns the latest expiration date of all products, nil if there are none

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: nonConsumablePurchases
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Returns all product IDs of the non-subscription purchases a user has made.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: nonSubscriptionTransactions
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Returns all the non-subscription purchases a user has made.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: originalApplicationVersion
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Returns the build number (in iOS) or the marketing version (in macOS) for the version of the application when the user bought the app.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: originalPurchaseDate
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Returns the purchase date for the version of the application when the user bought the app.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: requestDate
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Returns the fetch date of this Purchaser info.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: firstSeen
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: The date this user was first seen in RevenueCat.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: originalAppUserId
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: The original App User Id recorded for this user.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: managementURL
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: URL to manage the active subscription of the user.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -expirationDateForProductIdentifier:
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Get the expiration date for a given product identifier. You should use Entitlements though!

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -purchaseDateForProductIdentifier:
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Get the latest purchase or renewal date for a given product identifier. You should use Entitlements though!

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -expirationDateForEntitlement:
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Get the expiration date for a given entitlement.

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -purchaseDateForEntitlement:
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Get the latest purchase or renewal date for a given entitlement identifier.

Classes/RCPackage.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPack.name: identifier
Classes/RCPackage.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPack.abstract: Unique identifier for this package. Can be one a predefined package type or a custom one.

Classes/RCPackage.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPack.name: packageType
Classes/RCPackage.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPack.abstract: Package type for the product. Will be one of RCPackageType.

Classes/RCPackage.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPack.name: localizedIntroductoryPriceString
Classes/RCPackage.html#/c:objc(cs)RCPack.abstract: A String containing the localized introductory price

Classes/RCOfferings.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOf.name: current
Classes/RCOfferings.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOf.abstract: Current offering configured in the RevenueCat dashboard.

Classes/RCOfferings.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOf.name: all
Classes/RCOfferings.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOf.abstract: Dictionary of all Offerings (RCOffering) objects keyed by their identifier. This dictionary can also be accessed by using an index subscript on RCOfferings, e.g. offerings[@"offering_id"]. To access the current offering use RCOfferings.current.

Classes/RCOfferings.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOf.name: -offeringWithIdentifier:
Classes/RCOfferings.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOf.abstract: Retrieves a specific offering by its identifier, use this to access additional offerings configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, e.g. [offerings offeringWithIdentifier:@"offering_id"] or offerings[@"offering_id"]. To access the current offering use RCOfferings.current.

Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.name: lifetime
Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.abstract: Lifetime package type configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, if available.

Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.name: annual
Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.abstract: Annual package type configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, if available.

Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.name: sixMonth
Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.abstract: Six month package type configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, if available.

Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.name: threeMonth
Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.abstract: Three month package type configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, if available.

Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.name: twoMonth
Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.abstract: Two month package type configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, if available.

Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.name: monthly
Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.abstract: Monthly package type configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, if available.

Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.name: weekly
Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.abstract: Weekly package type configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, if available.

Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.name: -packageWithIdentifier:
Classes/RCOffering.html#/c:objc(cs)RCOff.abstract: Retrieves a specific package by identifier, use this to access custom package types configured in the RevenueCat dashboard, e.g. [offering packageWithIdentifier:@"custom_package_id"] or offering[@"custom_package_id"].

Classes/RCEntitlementInfos.html#/c:objc(.name: all
Classes/RCEntitlementInfos.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Dictionary of all EntitlementInfo (RCEntitlementInfo) objects (active and inactive) keyed by entitlement identifier. This dictionary can also be accessed by using an index subscript on EntitlementInfos, e.g. entitlementInfos[@"pro_entitlement_id"].

Classes/RCEntitlementInfos.html#/c:objc(.name: active
Classes/RCEntitlementInfos.html#/c:objc(.abstract: Dictionary of active EntitlementInfo (RCEntitlementInfo) objects keyed by entitlement identifier.

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: identifier
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The entitlement identifier configured in the RevenueCat dashboard

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: isActive
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: True if the user has access to this entitlement

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: willRenew
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: True if the underlying subscription is set to renew at the end of

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: periodType
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The last period type this entitlement was in

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: latestPurchaseDate
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The latest purchase or renewal date for the entitlement.

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: originalPurchaseDate
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The first date this entitlement was purchased

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: expirationDate
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The expiration date for the entitlement, can be nil for lifetime access.

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: store
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The store where this entitlement was unlocked from

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: productIdentifier
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The product identifier that unlocked this entitlement

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: isSandbox
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: False if this entitlement is unlocked via a production purchase

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: unsubscribeDetectedAt
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The date an unsubscribe was detected. Can be nil.

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: billingIssueDetectedAt
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The date a billing issue was detected. Can be nil if there is no

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.name: ownershipType
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Use this property to determine whether a purchase was made by the current user

Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html.name: RCEntitlementInfo
Classes/RCEntitlementInfo.html.abstract: The EntitlementInfo object gives you access to all of the information about the status of a user entitlement.

Classes/RCEntitlementInfos.html.name: RCEntitlementInfos
Classes/RCEntitlementInfos.html.abstract: This class contains all the entitlements associated to the user.

Classes/RCIntroEligibility.html.name: RCIntroEligibility
Classes/RCIntroEligibility.html.abstract: Class that holds the introductory price status

Classes/RCOffering.html.name: RCOffering
Classes/RCOffering.html.abstract: An offering is a collection of Packages (RCPackage) available for the user to purchase. For more info see https://docs.revenuecat.com/docs/entitlements

Classes/RCOfferings.html.name: RCOfferings
Classes/RCOfferings.html.abstract: This class contains all the offerings configured in RevenueCat dashboard. For more info see https://docs.revenuecat.com/docs/entitlements

Classes/RCPackage.html.name: RCPackage
Classes/RCPackage.html.abstract: Contains information about the product available for the user to purchase. For more info see https://docs.revenuecat.com/docs/entitlements

Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html.name: RCPurchaserInfo
Classes/RCPurchaserInfo.html.abstract: A container for the most recent purchaser info returned from RCPurchases. These objects are non-mutable and do not update automatically.

Classes/RCPurchases.html.name: RCPurchases
Classes/RCPurchases.html.abstract: RCPurchases is the entry point for Purchases.framework. It should be instantiated as soon as your app has a unique user id for your user. This can be when a user logs in if you have accounts or on launch if you can generate a random user identifier.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
